title: SkillPlanner Website
description: A website to learn skills based on my learning techniques i.e. creating plans dividing the tasks as daily task,week tasks and then I operated CRUD operations over them.I used AWS EC2 service,Docker to deploy the backend.

title: RealEstate Website
description: A complete fullstack MERN project which provides a platform to sell,buy,search real estate and has authentication to view personal profile.

title: Article Analyser
description: Article Analyser is a web application that allows users to upload articles for analysis, providing insights and suggestions for improvement. The application is built using React for the frontend and Node.js with Express for the backend, utilizing a MySQL database for data storage.

title: MentalHealth Wellness Site
description: Created a website to ensure and diagnose your mental health.

title: Prakriti Website
description: Created a chatbot which predicts prakriti of a human.
